docs.snippet: October is generally one of the most agreeable months in our changeable climate, and in our cities it is usually one of the most healthy. The past month has proved to be somewhat an exception to the general rule, being colder and more stormy than the...
docs.lead_paragraph: October is generally one of the most agreeable months in our changeable climate, and in our cities it is usually one of the most healthy. The past month has proved to be somewhat an exception to the general rule, being colder and more stormy than the average of Octobers. The effect upon the public health has not, however, been very marked.

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN CALIFORNIA.; Prince Lot Kamehameha Arrives How he Carries Himself, and Where The Bay District Agricultural Fair Thoroughbred Stock, Camels and Fancy Cattle Gov. Downey's Dig into Douglas Why the Census should be Abolished.

docs.lead_paragraph: Our Prince has arrived, and, in our quiet, undemonstrative way, we are enjoying him. On Thursday morning a pretty yacht of 156 tons, the Emma Rooke, (a little sister of the bark Yankee, both having been sired by a New-London builder,) came into our harbor, flying the royal standard of Hawaii. docs.snippet: DESTRUCTION OF A PAPER MILL BY FIRE. At about 5 o'clock on Saturday evening, and while the storm was at its height, a fire broke out in the buildings occupied by Messrs. HAMILTON  DONNELSON, at the corner of Carroll and Nevins streets, and the entire...
docs.lead_paragraph: DESTRUCTION OF A PAPER MILL BY FIRE. At about 5 o'clock on Saturday evening, and while the storm was at its height, a fire broke out in the buildings occupied by Messrs. HAMILTON DONNELSON, at the corner of Carroll and Nevins streets, and the entire establishment, including buildings, machinery and stock were destroyed.

headline.main: CALIFORNIA AND OREGON.; Election of Col. Baker to the Senate-- Oregon Fusion-- Gwinn Wandering in the Mountains-- Broderick's Will Miscellaneous News and Political Intelligence.

docs.snippet: It will please our readers to know that the health of Rev. JOSEPH SCUDDER is so far restored as to enable him to preach once more with something of his usual power. A service of about eight years in India, under an unfavorable climate, rendered his...
docs.lead_paragraph: It will please our readers to know that the health of Rev. JOSEPH SCUDDER is so far restored as to enable him to preach once more with something of his usual power. A service of about eight years in India, under an unfavorable climate, rendered his return to the United States necessary.

docs.snippet: The United States Mail steamship Cahawba, J. W. SMITH Commander, from New-Orleans and Havana, arrived at this port yesterday afternoon in 4 days and 3 hours from Havana.

headline.main: NEWS FROM CUBA.; Arrival of the Cahawba The Slave Trade Misscellaneous News.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship Cahawba, J. W. SMITH Commander, from New-Orleans and Havana, arrived at this port yesterday afternoon in 4 days and 3 hours from Havana.
